channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumbed general waste 2 months, 10th October
item.description:
This spot outside our street communal gate does not get cleaned by estate cleaners or community street cleaners it is a no man’s land for cleaning. General waste has been piling up here for months and no one will remove it but it has been added to by residents and passer bys. Lots of food waste also. Last pile to accumulate like this also never got removed for months again, in which I took it in my own hands. which leads me to believe it will not be dealt with again if already been 2months. Please can we find out if this area is part of the cleaning we pay for in part of our service charge as home owners. As I would like to take this further regarding this as maintance of building is falling behind in cleanliness.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-45, Swan Road, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing fly-tipping, 10th October
item.description:

item.title: Traffic and Road Block - Emergency / Ambulances, 10th October
item.description:
The recent changes and new traffic enforcement rules on Chatsworth road / Homerton row has resulted in all traffic being diverted down Median Road - which is one way road and a bus route. The traffic is causing emergency vehicles to also get stuck.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Median Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish everywhere, 10th October
item.description:
Bins are overflowing outside Weston Court. It’s disgusting and filthy. How can you let people leave in those conditions? Where are our taxes going? What are you spending money on? We need more bins or you need to collect rubbish more often.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Strong smell of urine on the pavement of Chiltern court/wonderpass walkway, 10th October
item.description:

item.title: Another huge fly tip in woods, 10th October
item.description:
